function bigImageTeaser({ displayTitle, image, url }) { var cssContainer = "max-w-7xl mx-auto px-2 sm:px-6 lg:px-8" var cssCardCompCont = "text-center relative" var cssCardCompImg = "inline-block" var cssCardCompText = "text-white inline-block" return (

{displayTitle}

 ) } export default bigImageTeaser
